title: Update 07. July 2015
comment: phpsysinfo v3.2.2. It's working now on my etrayz xTreamer. It was never running but now with the timeout up tot 45 seconds it works. Possible you can give a max of 60 seconds for slow arm processor mini server. Cool and hold up your super work. Mike.

title: Can't Get It to Work
comment: This program is great, and I got it to work on two web servers I own (10.0.0.180) and (10.0.0.185) on the LAN (yes I know it won't work outside LAN without port forwarding), but I have tried entering the URL into the "Host" section of this app and I keep getting the error "[XML_PARSER_ERROR] At line 1, column 0: unclosed token"... Any ideas? :)
Hi, please can you send me the output of your xml file by going to the url: xml.php?plugin=complete
I have psiphon but it's not work again I have to need old one

title: 5Stars!
comment: 5Stars!

title: how??
comment: how to use it...not understand....need host?who will be host!! i think dota...haha
Hi, you need to install phpSysInfo on a webserver. Then "host" is the url of your phpSysInfo installation. http://phpsysinfo.github.io/phpsysinfo/

title: Briljant!
comment: Perfect app for monitoring. Only one thing I would like to request as add-on. ZFS monitoring as an extra option would make this app even better. Keep on going dev!
Hi, thanks for the feedback, can we have more details about the add-on? You can create a request here: https://github.com/phpsysinfo/phpsysinfo/issues

title: Psiandroid
comment: Upgrade

title: Works precisely as intended
comment: Used for monitoring my Linode VPS. Clean design and very easy to use. It's even Material-aware for Android 5.0 Lollipop devices.

title: Need info
comment: I want know where is file configuration? Because i want to backup my configuration to another smartphone.

Hi,

Location (can require root access) /data/data/com.phpsysinfo/shared_prefs/phpsysinfo_prefs.xml
I want to try this ..gezzzz★
Ok

title: Poor layout.
comment: This is obviously new, but the layout is very poor. For example, mounted drives do not show the whole path, even in landscape mode. It also lacks a lot of the information that phpsysinfo gives in the browser. This app has a lot of promise, but it needs more development to be really useful. At this point you might as well open the browser on the phone and point it to your website.  EDIT: A little over a year later, this app has improved tremendously and was updated to address my gripes--something every user should respect, as developers don't always have the time to wade through wave after wave of us just to address our critique of their work. Super double A+, the app is simple and highly functional with a very workable UI.
Hi, the new version support full path display of mounted point and landscape mode. We also add a lot of info now. Did you want other information to display?

title: Works as the description says.
comment: Great way to monitor your systems on your phone!
Hi, thanks. What features or improvements did you want to see for the next version?

title: Really nice app.
comment: Works great.  Simple to use.
Great app. Excellent feedback from developer.

Hi, yes it's normal, an auto signed certificat it not valid until you trust (installed) the CA who signed the certificat (this CA can be auto-signed). I write a documentation here: https://github.com/rk4an/psiandroid/wiki

title: Works Great
comment: Easy to configure. Would like the option for it to auto refresh ever minute or so.
thanks, we working on an auto-refresh feature, coming soon ;)

title: Exactly what I want at a glance from my phone.
comment: The only other things I would want from a remote system status app would be a widget for my home screen.  Bravo.

title: Great App
comment: Allows me to see all my servers and monitor them individually.

title: Last Update
comment: is working perfect on my system. All three servers deliver all the needed information. Perfect application for my personal needs. One of the next thing can be a widget with different settings and or option's. Thank you Erkan.

title: Nice app if u have a VPS in the cloud
comment: Same as title. Simple but does its job well.
Works great

title: Very nice app, great support
comment: Nice simple interface, providing critical information about your server - uptime, load, users, memory and disk usage, critical processes (whether running or not).  Very simple to configure - just pass the URL of your phpSysInfo install on your server - and even simpler to use.  I had a problem with my configuration and could not get the app to load the data from my server, so emailed the developer. He responded within minutes and the problem was sorted within the hour - down to a typo in the configuration on my behalf.

title: Amazing Progress
comment: Literally getting better by the day, I emailed the developer about a feature request and not only did they respond to me same day, but added my request within hours.  Great app, even better developer...

title: Like it
comment: Cool little tool to get a quick check at my servers :)

title: Awesome but(t) ugly
comment: Constantly getting better. Awesome! Now it only needs a nicer UI.

title: Very nice app.
comment: I found this app very useful to have a quick glance at the status of my servers, directly from the phone. Too bad it looks ugly on my old Android 2.3...

title: Simple and Handy System Information
comment: I really like this app. PSI itself is a really handy web-based system information tool, but this app makes it easy to check on things whilst being mobile. I like how the interface is really simple, intuitive, and fits in well with the Android design principles. It shows just about everything that the web-based version does, but I'm sure the app will be feature complete soon. Great work!

title: Simple and effective.
comment: Easy to setup, works as expected, no issues that I can see.

title: Awesome app for server admins!
comment: This app is a very handy tool for anyone who likes to keep tabs on their servers. PhpSysInfo is very easy to setup to begin with, and it just makes it even easier from your mobile device. Very responsive dev! Emailed with a feature request and 3 days later an update was pushed out with my request!!

title: Great application.
comment: Great app, waiting for the other cool options (Temperatures, Networks information)

title: Great development.
comment: Active development, regular updates and nice interface.

title: Great start
comment: Expandable sections. Woot ;)

title: Fantastic tool
comment: Great app that does what it needs to do. Dev is quick and responsive to issues and concerns. Top class!

title: Good Start
comment: First off, I love phpsysinfo in the browser.   This is a great start for Android support.   My only complaint would be that it doesn't show nearly as much info as the browser does.  I wish I would see my temps, fan speeds, UPS battery % or run time, and HDD SMART data.  With a review rating of 2, this app is still a baby - excited for future releases!

title: Awesome
comment: Getting better; just emailed you!
